article:
The United Mexican States () is a federal republic composed of 32 federal
entities: 31 states and 1 federal district.

According to the Constitution of 1917, the states of the federation are free and
sovereign. Each state has its own congress and constitution, while
the Federal District has only limited autonomy with a local Congress and
government. The territory of the Federal District, commonly known and referred
to as Mexico City, serves as the national capital.
